name: Parasuit-Prototype
description:
Play a Mercenary Parasite-hitman trying to perform contracts efficiently as he can in his alternate modern-day world.

In "parasuit" you will move to different levels with only one objective! eliminate everyone that is alive on that floor, while taking control of enemies' bodies and minds!

-Fast-paced action! Calculate carefully your moves to be an efficient killing machine!

-Possess the enemies! Pass from a body to another and be unpredictable!
